name: Tyro Knight Prototype
description:
Hello there, if you don't know about this game let me introduce you to this game. This game's name is Tyro Knight, it's story is about a knight that fall into a large mine, your main goal is to escape the cave with magical gems you encounter in the process. 'Tyro' from Tyro Knight is synonym for the word beginner.

In this game, the goal is to escape the cave, this prototype is a very short platformer with metroidvania room level design. This is a game in very early prototype phase. This game has all the core features and a bit more secondary features.

Here's the basic controls in the game:

Moving - A or Left Arrow and Right Arrow or D

Jumping - Spacebar or Up Arrow

Attacking or Dashing - Left Click

Shooting - Right Click

Interacting - E

Pause Menu- Escape

You can also look into my devlog to see all my progress. Here's the link to the devlog. You can give feedback in the comment if you like, the feedback can improve the game in the future, either for bugs and glitches or might even giving new ideas for a feature or two.

Well, thats about it, goodbye and have fun

Note: this is not a horror game
